hero.paragraph: Passionate for the frontend, creating awesome web sites for all internet.

about.paragraph: I always enjoy the technology, as i know more and the time passed that joy becomes in love. Eventually i start in collage studding electronic engineering on computation, in parallel i learn web development. Once graduated, i get a job on the software industry, since then i'm  focus every day be a better profesional and person.
